#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <map>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    map<string,int> participant;
    int i,n,level=0;
    string name;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>name;
        if(participant.count(name))
            participant[name]++;
        else
            participant[name] = 1;

        if(participant[name]>level)
        {
            cout<<level+1<<" "<<name<<endl;
            level++;
        }
        //cout<<participant[name]<<endl;
    }
    //cout<<participant.size()<<endl;
    return 0;
}
